com.stormpath.sdk.oauth

Interface RefreshGrantRequestBuilder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Oauth2AuthenticationRequestBuilder<RefreshGrantRequest>

    public interface RefreshGrantRequestBuilder
extends Oauth2AuthenticationRequestBuilder<RefreshGrantRequest>
    Builder that can construct RefreshGrantRequest instances.
    Since:
    1.0.RC7

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RefreshGrantRequest build()
      Builds a new RefreshGrantRequest instance based on the current builder state.
      RefreshGrantRequestBuilder setRefreshToken(String refreshToken)
      Specifies the refresh token that will be used to obtain a new Access Token without requiring credentials.

    • Method Detail

      • setRefreshToken

        RefreshGrantRequestBuilder setRefreshToken(String refreshToken)
        Specifies the refresh token that will be used to obtain a new Access Token without requiring credentials.
        Parameters:
        refreshToken - the refresh token that will be used to create a new authentication token.
        Returns:
        this instance for method chaining.

      • build

        RefreshGrantRequest build()
        Builds a new RefreshGrantRequest instance based on the current builder state.
        Specified by:
        build in interface Oauth2AuthenticationRequestBuilder<RefreshGrantRequest>
        Returns:
        the RefreshGrantRequest object used to create a new authentication token
